config.title: Encrypted Connection
config.description: This are the encrypted connection information about your servers. Don't edit this!

password.title: Encrypted Password
password.description: This is the encrypted password. Don't edit this!

allowedConsumers.title: Whitelisted Consumers (encrypted)
allowedConsumers.description: You can clear this to disallow access to your server configuration for all third-party packages.

disallowedConsumers.title: Blacklisted Consumers (encrypted)
disallowedConsumers.description: You can clear this to allow all third-party packages to request access to your server configuration.

toggleOnStartup.title: Open On Startup
toggleOnStartup.description: Open the view automatically when atom starts.

showInDock.title: Open In Atom Dock
showInDock.description: Open the view as tab in atom dock instead of panel. Only available from Atom 1.17.0.

showOnRightSide.title: Show On Right Side
showOnRightSide.description: Show the view on the right side of the editor instead of the left.

allowPendingPaneItems.title: Allow Pending Pane Items
allowPendingPaneItems.description: Allow items to be previewed without adding them to a pane permanently, such as when single clicking files in the tree view.

hideIgnoredNames.title: Hide Ignored Files
hideIgnoredNames.description: Don't show items matched by the `Ignored Names` core config setting.

showHiddenFiles.title: Show Hidden Files
showHiddenFiles.description: Force FTP Server to show hidden files (e.g. htaccess).

sortFoldersBeforeFiles.title: Sort Folders Before Files
sortFoldersBeforeFiles.description: When listing directory items, list subdirectories before listing files.

sortServerProfilesByName.title: Sort Servers By Name
sortServerProfilesByName.description: When listing servers items, list servers by name rather than by host.

autoRevealActiveFile.title: Auto Reveal Active File
autoRevealActiveFile.description: Auto reveal the current active file on the tree view.

alwaysReopenFile.title: Always reopen file
alwaysReopenFile.description: If file is opened it will be always reloaded

filterKeyForItem.title: Key For Search
filterKeyForItem.description: Specifies the key at which the search is to be used.

ignoredNames.title: Ignored Names
ignoredNames.description: List of [glob patterns](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Glob_%28programming%29). Files and directories matching these patterns and the `Ignored Names` core config setting will be ignored during indexing.

openProtocolViewOnError.title: Failed Upload
openProtocolViewOnError.description: Open protocol view in case of failed upload.

debug.title: Debug Mode
debug.description: Output debug messages to the console.
